name: Buffet Burnout
description:
Take control of the hungriest bro around town in a janky, high-speed adventure through the buffet! Zoom through the buffet counters and hoard the food that spills out to keep your hunger at bay! But watch out -- the police want to put an end to your spree, and the wet floor signs aren't too delicious, either! Avoid them as you make your way through your local flavortown!

Controls: WASD for movement

Made for: Food Jam!! - 8/5/2018

Theme:  " Food / Buffet "

Made by:

Andrew Mylet (paperspine) & Michael Rodriguez

CREDITS:

Background Music by:   Mark Sparling https://soundcloud.com/marksparling
